title: Upsell - Device Insurance
description: After selling a customer a new high-end smartphone, the agent should attempt to sell them device insurance.

tasks.description: Following a new phone order, present the device insurance options.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pivots to an insurance offer.

tasks.description: Explain the coverage details (e.g., theft, accidental damage) and the monthly cost.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains what the insurance covers.

tasks.description: Add the selected insurance plan to the customer's account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the insurance feature.
